MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the SY21 postcode area of Welshpool, affecting properties in Park Road, Fairview Avenue and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at  11:18PM. Our engineers are on their way to the local area to investigate and repair the fault and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 2:30AM. Once they arrive, or when we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:55PM on  22nd January 2021.
